function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relying solely on wearable sensors and smart solutions for large-scale detection of cases may result in inaccurate or incomplete data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective data integration and sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"One health approach in guinea-bissau and indonesia","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial subsidies may lead to an increase in the production and distribution of iot devices, potentially increasing the risk of disease transmission through contaminated devices.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited understanding of biosensor terminology among environmental audience","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of infection in regularly attended indoor spaces due to prolonged exposure to pre/asymptomatic individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete epidemiological data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of filters and air cleaning methods","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertain prognoses and severe shortages of resources for testing and treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of personal protective equipment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in determining the risk and severity of infection based on viral exposure and deposition in the respiratory system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robust and trustful data sharing infrastructures in the medical world","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political response to warnings of human disaster and resilience in public health and welfare.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lower-income population residing in low-rent areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of moisture management and humidity control for disease prevention","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Heightened social tensions and security risks in informal settlements, including criminal activity and strained socioeconomic conditions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of viruses due to surface contact in the building","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in identifying when physical and mental exertion is beyond the individual’s capacity may lead to prolonged symptoms and setbacks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Epidemics and pandemics leading to public response and increased stress levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to outdoor areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on the poor and vulnerable","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through collaborative research and writing activities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blurred functional boundaries and virtual circle may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases within the community","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient testing and approval of medical inventions for disease prevention may lead to ineffective or unsafe products being used in the market","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing big data from wireless sensor networks, characterized by volume, velocity, and variety.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived lack of transparency from health and government authorities concerning the severity of the outbreak.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Early stage outbreak containment in a specific area","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interaction between smart and non-smart workers in relation to psychological health outcomes.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of health recommendations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of transport operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of suitable environments for working from home leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nurses working long hours in isolation facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of public spaces and suspension of activities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate enforcement of social distancing regulations in sports facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on the influence of cultural factors on workplace viral transmission and interaction with covid-19 ipc measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low levels of satisfaction with telecommuting","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate spaces accentuate health risks and interfere with productivity in remote working and school performances","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operators sharing data without proper sanitation or protection measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of up-to-date information on covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic of covid-19 causing daily loss of lives and economic downturn","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of online surveys for data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of universal standards for data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of urbanization on disease propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of prolonged indoor exposure leading to reduced physical and mental health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The risk of covid-19 transmission in areas with high occupancy levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supported physical distancing interventions leading to high epidemic peaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of hospital environment with sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of global education and lack of distance-learning solutions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
